sourcesContent: import{jsx as e,jsxs as o}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{getActorState as r,translate as n,AuthChallengeNames as i}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{Flex as t}from"../../../primitives/Flex/Flex.js";import{Heading as s}from"../../../primitives/Heading/Heading.js";import{useAuthenticator as a}from"../hooks/useAuthenticator/index.js";import{useCustomComponents as m}from"../hooks/useCustomComponents/index.js";import{useFormHandlers as c}from"../hooks/useFormHandlers/useFormHandlers.js";import{FormFields as d}from"../shared/FormFields.js";import{ConfirmSignInFooter as l}from"../shared/ConfirmSignInFooter.js";import{RemoteErrorMessage as f}from"../shared/RemoteErrorMessage.js";import{RouteContainer as u}from"../RouteContainer/RouteContainer.js";const h=({className:r,variation:n})=>{const{isPending:i}=a((e=>[e.isPending])),{handleChange:s,handleSubmit:p}=c(),{components:{ConfirmSignIn:{Header:g=h.Header,Footer:j=h.Footer}}}=m();return e(u,Object.assign({className:r,variation:n},{children:e("form",Object.assign({"data-amplify-form":"","data-amplify-authenticator-confirmsignin":"",method:"post",onChange:s,onSubmit:p},{children:o(t,Object.assign({as:"fieldset",direction:"column",isDisabled:i},{children:[e(g,{}),o(t,Object.assign({direction:"column"},{children:[e(d,{}),e(f,{})]})),e(l,{}),e(j,{})]}))}))}))};h.Header=function(){const{_state:o}=a(),t=r(o),{challengeName:m}=t.context;let c;switch(m){case i.SMS_MFA:c=n("Confirm SMS Code");break;case i.SOFTWARE_TOKEN_MFA:c=n("Confirm TOTP Code");break;default:throw new Error(`${n("Unexpected challengeName encountered in ConfirmSignIn:")} ${m}`)}return e(s,Object.assign({level:3},{children:c}))},h.Footer=function(){return null};export{h as ConfirmSignIn};
